dict.acceptation: 盎司；<口>少量，一点儿；雪豹；

sent.orig: Moreover,ounce for ounce,bread and potatoes have fewer calories than sirloin steak and roast beef.
sent.trans: 此外，一盎司面包或土豆比一盎司牛排或烤牛肉的热量要小。

sent.orig: Atropine, 100ounce lots, $3.25per ounce fob new york.
sent.trans: 阿托品，每100盎司一批，纽约船上交货价每盎司3。25美元。

sent.orig: Moreover, ounce for ounce, bread and potatoes have fewer calories than sirloin8 steak and roast beef.
sent.trans: 再者，同等重量的面包和马铃薯比牛排和烤牛肉所含的热量少得多。

sent.orig: Ounce for ounce, blends of different artificial sweeteners match any individual artificial sweetener in sweetening power.
sent.trans: 一对一的用混合代糖和单一糖在甜料中作比较。

sent.orig: An ounce in liquid measure is different from an ounce in dry measure.
sent.trans: 液量的一盎斯与干量的一盎斯不同。
